title: in-class-exercise-3
description: A short description of the post.
contents:
Getting Started
This code chunk create a list of R packages needed and install them if they are not installed.


packages = c('sf', 'tmap', 'tidyverse')
for (p in packages){
if(!require(p, character.only = T)){
  install.packages(p)
}
library(p,character.only = T)
}




Cleaning RDS file
This coded chuck reads the RDS file from the path and display the data.



mpsz_pop2020 <- read_rds(“../../../IS415/Hands-on_Ex/Hands-on_Ex03/data/rds/mpszpop2020.rds”)

knitr::kable(head(mpsz_pop2020))

title: In-class Exercise 2
description: In this hands-on exercise, I learn how to handle geospatial data in R by using sf package.

title: Welcome to IS415 blog
description:
Welcome to our new blog, IS415 blog. We hope you enjoy 
reading what we have to say!
